attributes.action: fund NICE research into the medicinal, anti - carcinogent properties of pomegranate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petitioner is calling on the govt. to proactively make guidelines to dieticians and include the use of pomegranate dietary advice as part of routine care for cancer patients. As far as I am aware, pomegranate supplements are not available for purchase over the counter - but this would be one useful, evidence - based treatment option, in accordance with the disease prevention and management targets of the NHS Plan.
